channel.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
channel.description:
Hey guys, i have just added d claws to my server with working spec. Everything works except it stand "NOT EXCISTING ITEM" so i have to add the item to item.cfg. But when i add this code to item.cfg:
[code]item = 8002 dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 8082.75812950955 8082.75812950955 10097.4541806258 26 38 -4 0 0 10 19 5 0 200 400 0[/code]
Then i get this error when i compile it:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBonusException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112[/code]
What is wrong? How can i fix it?

item.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
item.dc:creator: @Jaran Jaran
item.description:
@Jaran wrote:

Nice :d Got it working now, thx. Last thing When i use the claws i can still use a shield. How do i do so you cant use d claws and a shield`?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error

item.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
item.dc:creator: @laveerre laveerre
item.description:
@laveerre wrote:

actually the 200 is a defense bonus…

Read full topic
item.source: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error

item.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
item.dc:creator: @Zoft Zoft
item.description:
@Zoft wrote:

The 200 and 400 need to be lowered them are the bonuses the higher they are the higher you’ll hit.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error

item.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
item.dc:creator: @Jaran Jaran
item.description:
@Jaran wrote:

Ah thx, they are working now. Only thing i need to change… How can i change atk hit? I hitted like 39-39-80-0 with spec and 70 without spec :S Where do i change this?

Read full topic
item.source: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error

item.title: Adding d claws to item.cfg - Error
item.dc:creator: @wouterdevos wouterdevos
item.description:
@wouterdevos wrote:

you’re using spaces,

you have to use Tabs

Read full topic

Hey guys, i have just added d claws to my server with working spec. Everything works except it stand “NOT EXCISTING ITEM” so i have to add the item to item.cfg. But when i add this code to item.cfg:

item = 8002 dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 8082.75812950955 8082.75812950955 10097.4541806258 26 38 -4 0 0 10 19 5 0 200 400 0

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBonusException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.(init)(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:112
